review:
*** ***** ** * **** ************* He was part of the doctors team who attended my daughter's delivery. 
He was the Doctor who brought my grandson out from the operation theatre. 
He explained in detail about the child immediately after delivery. 
Our relationship continued even after delivery also. Whenever we meet him for our grand son he used explain clearly about the child's health and the type of medication he is offering. 
Not only for children we used to call him for any problem for his suggestions. 
Once when I was hospitalised in Bangalore for food poison, he suggested some changes in treatment to my Doctor over phone which saved my life.

**** ************** friendly *** ********* Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He’s a doctor with a personal touch. He addressed my baby’s problems very well. But the best part was, he appeared more like a grandfather than a doctor. He handles anxious parents very well, patiently answering our unending questions . It was great to have found him on Practo

*** ** ***** ** * **** ************* ************* *** * ***** ****** **** He has more than 35 years of experience and is very humble and approachable.  He is so cool with kids and interact with them in a friendly way.

He treats patients without scaring them about their health conditions. In my opinion, this is an important aspect we should look for in any physician.  Dr. GV Reddy's down-to-earth attitude will put you at ease. ** ** *** ** *** ******* ******* * **** **** ********

He is truly a trusted and experienced doctor we have ever visited. He is very friendly and easy approachable person. 
He has treated both our kids. When our second baby was born, baby didn't take feed at all. He was the paediatrician. He treated well. He took utmost care.Proper treatment was given.Baby was able to recover very soon and he made sure baby takes proper feed.

Good morning sir, How are you sir,? I have known sir over the years.First of all sir is very good human being He is attentive to words of poorers and down trodden people.Sir is not after money but  for the welfare of the poorers.Sir is dedicative in his service.Sir  is very much humble and simple in his hole life.Sir treats every one like his relatives and friends.Sir renders services in dedicated manner.I have never found abusive words in sir's conversation.Sir calls everyone as Vaangamma or sarima.Sir is eminent paediatrician.and well known personality around north and Central chennai.We are lucky to get used the services of sir.Sir should alive in the medical world for the welfare of the poorers and down trodden  people.I have worked with sir for years.I wish sir good health and long life I pray to God for his long life.

In one word I can tell about our family Dr.Reddy Garu having consultation for more than 40 yrs.that His Simplicity,Sympatical approach & proper treatment to Poor,Middle class Patients with nominal fees some times free consultations  & gives medicines also without charging for the same & Dr sometimes pay some min.financial help also for the aggreived patients.It was true from my experience & Association with our family Dr.Garu..never torture the patients.Dr.'s approach to them was mostly with smiley face & affectionately that itself was a basic thing for a Dr. which was Healthy boost to Patients . Finally, I repeat our forefather's statement that Doctor is next to God whom we have not seen with this naked eyes but the Patient exchange his / her sufferings with Doctor in person to cure from the decease.
